The 'diffval' package for R 1.2.0.9000
  • Reference

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

diffval (development version)

diffval 1.2.0

CRAN release: 2025-10-22

  • Added function internal_assignment()
  • Improved documentation, linking to Monteiro-Henriques (2025, https://doi.org/10.3897/VCS.140466).

diffval 1.1.0

CRAN release: 2023-03-09

Major changes

  • Function bigdata_tdv() added, allowing Total Differential Value calculation for big matrices, optionally using fork with package parallel.
  • Two auxiliary functions added to assist bigdata_tdv() in utils.R.

Bug fixes

  • Improved sorting in tabulation() function.
  • TDV calculation was corrected for some cases in optim_tdv_hill_climb() and in the associated auxiliary function in utils.R.

diffval 1.0.0

CRAN release: 2022-11-14

  • Updated version, for package release.

diffval 0.0.0.9025

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.

On this page
